title: Is the Native American flute easy to learn? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, it’s very easy to learn. You generate the sound by blowing air into the mouthpiece, like in a whistle. You don’t need to do anything with your lips, but control the strength of the breath - but this is very natural. The flute is tuned to minor pentatonic scale, which is very natural for us, and composing melodies with it is very simple. A Native flute is probably the simplest flute to play in the world. I do have an entire website dedicated to teaching this wonderful instrument, read one of the articles: How to Learn to Play Native American Flute
